RumorFact.Text: I found a weird clockwork vault next to the launch pad elevator.
I got part of the combo from a recording Esker left.
I got part of the combo from a recording Feldspar left.
I got part of the combo from a recording Chert left.
I got part of the combo from a recording Gabbro left.
I got part of the combo from a recording Riebeck left.
I got part of the combo from a recording Hal left.

ExploreFact.Text: The vault contained an old picture and a very sweet note.

RumorFact.Text: Slate says that the recording next to him is a hint from Esker.

ExploreFact.Text: I found the first hint from Esker sitting next to slate.
Apparently I should expect a scavenger hunt hint from every traveller. Once I find them all, I can open the vault.

RumorFact.Text: According to Esker's hint, I can find Feldspar's recording somewhere where I can practice repairing my ship.

ExploreFact.Text: I found the recording from Feldspar in the "satellite" in the Zero-G Cave.

RumorFact.Text: "The quiet shade, where the trees do move, in the ancient glade, Iâ€™ve left something for you."

ExploreFact.Text: I found Riebeck's recording next to Gabbro's quantum poem.
